alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 18 at 2:59PM MST until June 19 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern and west-central Coconino County including the locations of Flagstaff, Doney Park, Williams, Munds Park and Valle. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
